response:

* call you names - father
* give you angry looks - mother
* put down your friends - father
* say things to scare you - mother
* make you do something embarrassing - father
* encourage you to open up - mother
* open to your ideas - both (we're a team!)
* excited to see you - mother
* listen attentively to you - both (we're always listening)
